properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
BARBUDA.
28 FOOT F/V, FOUR PERSONS ON BOARD, GREEN AND WHITE HULL,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE. LAST KNOWN
POSITION VICINITY 17-40N 061-30W AT 290015Z JUL.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, TELEX: 42912008,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024, PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450, E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
